job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen van schaalbare en krachtige (AI) applicaties met behulp van het Laravel/Vue-framework
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core task of building software applications using specific frameworks, which falls under traditional software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Samenwerken met ons team van ongeveer 15 collega's aan end-to-end AI-applicatieontwikkeling
job_tasks.justification: This describes collaboration within a software development team and working on the full lifecycle of AI applications, fitting the integration and development aspect.

job_tasks.phrase: Incidenteel gebruik van low-code platforms zoals n8n en Flutterflow i.c.m. je fullcode ervaring en skills
job_tasks.justification: While mentioning low-code, it's in conjunction with full-code experience and skills, indicating integration of different development approaches into application building.

job_tasks.phrase: Vertalen van complexe AI-concepten naar praktische toepassingen voor onze klanten
job_tasks.justification: This task involves understanding business needs (customers) and translating technical concepts (AI) into practical solutions, aligning with business understanding and strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Bijdragen aan het continu verbeteren van onze Software Development As A Service methode
job_tasks.justification: This refers to improving the development process and methodology, which is a software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: Ervaring met het ontwerpen en implementeren van RESTful API's
job_tasks.justification: Designing and implementing APIs is a fundamental software development task.
Version control is a standard software development practice.

job_tasks.phrase: Ervaring met AI-technologieën zoals Machine Learning is een pré
job_tasks.justification: While phrased as a 'pré' and general AI/ML, it points towards tasks related to AI/ML, which could involve data aspects or model understanding, fitting into the broader AI Specialization category, specifically data management or model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Mogelijkheid om je expertise in cutting-edge AI-technologieën te vergroten
job_tasks.justification: This benefit directly relates to learning and expanding expertise in new technologies, fitting the Learning & Adaptability category.

job_tasks.phrase: Onze aanpak combineert low-code platforms zoals n8n en Flutterflow met fullcode-ontwikkeling in frameworks als Laravel, Vue en Angular.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of different development approaches (low-code and full-code) into the overall application development process.

job_tasks.phrase: Hierdoor kunnen we snel schaalbare en krachtige AI-applicaties leveren die voldoen aan de specifieke behoeften van onze klanten.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase emphasizes the outcome of software development: delivering scalable and powerful AI applications.

job_tasks.phrase: ons doel is om organisaties te helpen hun processen te stroomlijnen, waardevolle inzichten te ontdekken en hun bedrijfsresultaten te verbeteren.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the business objective of the company's services, which the developer's work contributes to, indicating a need for business understanding.

soft_skills.phrase: Samenwerken met ons team van ongeveer 15 collega's
Goede beheersing van de Nederlandse en Engelse taal in woord en geschrift
soft_skills.justification: Specifies language proficiency, which is a key aspect of communication.

soft_skills.phrase: Analytisch sterk en in staat om complexe problemen op te lossen
soft_skills.justification: Highlights analytical skills and the ability to solve complex problems.
Proactiveness implies taking initiative and ownership, while customer-oriented relates to understanding business needs.

soft_skills.phrase: Mogelijkheid om je expertise in cutting-edge AI-technologieën te vergroten
soft_skills.justification: This benefit directly relates to learning and expanding expertise in new technologies.

profile.rationale: The job ad heavily emphasizes traditional full-stack development tasks using Laravel and VueJS (Macro-Category A). While AI technologies like Machine Learning, Generative AI, and AI Vision are mentioned, they are presented as an area to 'increase expertise' or as part of 'AI applications' being developed, rather than the core focus of model development or specialization. The primary responsibilities revolve around building and integrating AI applications using established frameworks, fitting the profile of a Software Engineer who works with AI features.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines traditional software development responsibilities and technologies. The mention of AI is present but secondary to the core full-stack development role. The distinction between a core AI role and an AI-adjacent role is reasonably clear, though a stronger emphasis on specific AI tasks or models would have increased confidence further.
